questions.answer: It is the punctuation before a conjunction in a list.

questions.question: What is the only capital of Brazil crossed by the Equator?

questions.answer: São Paulo and Rio de Janeiro

questions.question: In which city is the world's first urban elevator and what is the name of that elevator?
questions.answer: The Lacerda Elevator (Elevador Lacerda) is a public urban elevator located in Salvador, Brazil, connecting the lower city (Cidade Baixa) to the upper city (Cidade Alta).
